Getting Here

  • FLL → ORH:
    Direct flights on JetBlue from Fort Lauderdale to our doorstep.
  • Everywhere else:
    Fly into Boston.

  • Courtyard Marriot
    72 Grove St, Worcester, Massachusetts
    Call 508-363-0300 before August 15.
  • We also recommend Air BnB.

  • Transit: We're working on arranging mass transportation to and from the hotel.
  • Parking: There is ample street parking. Please avoid parking in front of 512 or 514 Mill Street.
